name: Conflict of Chaos
description:
Conflict of Chaos (WORKING TITLE) is a roguelike, card based, turn based rpg! Fight monsters using cards and items! Level up and collect equipment to make you stronger and get special effects! Explore varied zones and areas and make your way to the end and defeat the final boss! Unlock new races and classes to make each run unique! Can you get to the end of the demo?!

Try and play for at least 20-30 minutes! The game takes about 20-50 minutes to complete a run (but can take more if you go slow)!

ALL FEEDBACK  AND IDEAS ARE APPRECIATED! (as well as donations :D Consider donating 1-2$)

We are posting this prototype specifically for feedback and ideas!

How To Play (Playing the tutorial is recommended):

-Choose a race and class

-Buy and sell items/gear/moves in the shops

-Move around the maps using the mouse (You are the blue circle. Click on the grey circle to move to that position)

-Fight enemies and get gear and moves to make a unique build

-View all status effects by hovering over the "Question Block" in the top right of the screen
